org.opends.sdk
Interface ConnectionResultHandler<C extends AsynchronousConnection,P>

Type Parameters:
C - The type of asynchronous connection handled by this connection result handler.
P - The type of the additional parameter to this handler's methods. Use Void for visitors that do not need an additional parameter.
public interface ConnectionResultHandler<C extends AsynchronousConnection,P>

A completion handler which is notified when an asynchronous connection attempt has completed.

ConnectionFactory objects allow a connection result completion handler to be specified when attempting to connect to a Directory Server. The handleConnection(P, C) method is invoked when the operation completes successfully. The handleConnectionError(P, org.opends.sdk.ErrorResultException) method is invoked if the operations fails.

Implementations of these methods should complete in a timely manner so as to avoid keeping the invoking thread from dispatching to other completion handlers.

Method Summary
 void handleConnection(P p, C connection)
          Invoked when the asynchronous connection has completed successfully.
 void handleConnectionError(P p, ErrorResultException error)
          Invoked when the asynchronous connection attempt has failed.
 

Method Detail

handleConnection

void handleConnection(P p,
                      C connection)
Invoked when the asynchronous connection has completed successfully.

Parameters:
p - A handler specified parameter.
connection - The connection which can be used to interact with the Directory Server.

handleConnectionError

void handleConnectionError(P p,
                           ErrorResultException error)
Invoked when the asynchronous connection attempt has failed.

Parameters:
p - A handler specified parameter.
error - The error result exception indicating why the asynchronous connection attempt has failed.
